0.text: Innate: After casting an ability, Lee Sin's next 2 basic attacks within 3 seconds gain  40% bonus attack speed and restore  energy.

1.text: The first attack restores 20 / 30 / 40 (based on level) energy and the second attack restores「 half of that amount. 」「 10 / 15 / 20 (based on level) energy. 」

0.text: Active: Lee Sin fires a sonic blast in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and marks them for 3 seconds, during which they are  revealed.

1.text: While the target is marked, Lee Sin can cast  Resonating Strike.

0.text: Active: Lee Sin  dashes to the nearby enemy marked by  Sonic Wave, consuming the mark upon arrival to deal physical damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health).

1.text: Iron Will and  Cripple can be cast during the dash.

0.text:
Active: Lee Sin  dashes to the target allied unit's location. If the ally is a  champion, both they and Lee Sin gain a  shield for 2 seconds upon his arrival and Safeguard's cooldown is  halved.
Lee Sin can self-cast Safeguard to shield himself.

1.text: After Safeguard is cast, Lee Sin can cast  Iron Will within the next 3 seconds.

2.text: Iron Will and  Cripple can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Lee Sin gains  life steal and  spell vamp for 4 seconds.
Active: Lee Sin smashes the ground beneath him, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies, marking them for 4 seconds and, if they are not  invisible when struck,  revealing them for the same duration.

1.text: If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast  Cripple within the next 3 seconds after a 0.1-second delay.

0.text: Active: Lee Sin sends a wave to nearby enemies marked by  Tempest, which  slows them for 4 seconds, decaying over the duration.

Active: Lee Sin  roots the target enemy champion during the cast time and roundhouse kicks them, dealing physical damage and  knocking them back up-to 800 units over 0.8 seconds, rendering them  airborne for 1 second.

1.text: Enemies that collide with the displaced enemy while it is  airborne take bonus physical damage and are  knocked up for 1 second.

0.content: 175 / 400 / 625 (+ 200% bonus AD) (+ 12 / 15 / 18% of primary target's bonus health)
